channel.title: CVE Feed for Blynk -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Blynk -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-29496|2024-08-03T06:26:06.024Z -- blynk -- blynk-library
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the BlynkConsole.h runCommand functionality of Blynk -Library v1.0.1. A specially-crafted network request can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.
